install.packages("shiny")
library(shiny)

ui = fluidPage(
  sliderInput(inputId = "zscore", label = "Set the z score to see the one tailed p value left of the z score", min = -5, max = 5, value = 0), 
  textOutput(outputId = "p value")
)
server = function(input, output) {}
shinyApp(ui=ui, server=server)
